database

Class DatabaseSelect

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.Database
      • database.DatabaseSelect

  • public class DatabaseSelect
extends Database
    This class implements the behavior of executing a select statement and shows the result of the query in a separate window. Also calls Table Column Adjuster to configure the size of the columns of the result
    Author:
